Articles.Content:
I have been playing KSP for quite awhile. Decided to join in on the forum to add my 2 cents to discussions and question the viability of certain mod ideas.

It's nice to be here.

Hello Core and welcome to the KSP forums!

I'm glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
Thank you! I'll be needing those happy landings when I realize I decoupled the wrong stage when I land.
